## decode variable

Parse a querystring into a parameters object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
decode: typeof qs.parse
```

## Remarks

This is a wrapper of `qs.parse` from the `qs` library.

See the [qs](https://www.npmjs.com/package/qs) package for more info.
